member.name: T:Made4Net.Label.LabelHandler
member.summary: Summary description for LabelHandler. // 7/25/2015: Reverted RWMS-2412 changes back to single log file.

member.name: M:Made4Net.Label.LabelLoftware.PrintLabel(System.String,System.String,System.Data.DataSet,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Duplicates ;//an exact copy Pages ;//an exact copy with layout PrinterNumber;//The configured device id Quantity ;//number of copies with inc/dec index LabelsPath ; //- label location LayoutPath ; PrinterPath ; //- path to LPS install dir or printr32.dll DropDirectory ; // - WDrop directory Pass Files - The Pass File (saved as .pas) is a simple ASCII text file that has all the data for the label that is to be printed. This type of file “passes” commands, variable field names and corresponding data to the LPS.

member.name: M:Made4Net.Label.LabelText.PrintLabel(System.String,System.String,System.Data.DataSet,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Printing all labels to one single file and then send it to printer
